citation.title: Continuous and intermittent exposure of neonatal rat calvarial cells to PTHrP (1-36) inhibits bone nodule mineralization in vitro by downregulating bone sialoprotein expression via the cAMP signaling pathway

peer_reviews.title: Continuous and intermittent exposure of neonatal rat calvarial cells to PTHrP (1-36) inhibits bone nodule mineralization in vitro by downregulating bone sialoprotein expression via the cAMP signaling pathway
peer_reviews.summary: This is an interesting and well written manuscript demonstrating that PTHrP blocks the mineralization of bone nodules developing in cultures of rat neonatal calvarial osteoblasts. Although similar data have been observed with PTH, and indeed both PTH and P

peer_reviews.title: Continuous and intermittent exposure of neonatal rat calvarial cells to PTHrP (1-36) inhibits bone nodule mineralization in vitro by downregulating bone sialoprotein expression via the cAMP signaling pathway

peer_reviews.title: Continuous and intermittent exposure of neonatal rat calvarial cells to PTHrP (1-36) inhibits bone nodule mineralization in vitro by downregulating bone sialoprotein expression via the cAMP signaling pathway
peer_reviews.summary: I approve the revised version of this manuscript without reservations.
